eligibilityCriterionItems.name: ICD indication
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patient has a Class I or IIa indication for implantation of an ICD according to the ACC/AHA/HRS Guidelines, or ESC guidelines.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Age requirement
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patient is at least 18 years of age and meets age requirements per local law.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Geographic stability and compliance
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patient is geographically stable and willing and able to complete the study procedures and visits for the duration of the follow-up.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Informed consent
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patient is unwilling or unable to personally provide Informed Consent.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Bradycardia pacing or CRT indication
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patient has indications for bradycardia pacing or Cardiac Resynchronization Therapy (CRT) (Class I, IIa, or IIb indication).

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Existing device or leads
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patients with an existing pacemaker, ICD, or CRT device implant or leads.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Prior medical interventions
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patients with these medical interventions are excluded from participation in the study: Prior sternotomy; Any prior medical condition or procedure that leads to adhesions in the anterior mediastinal space (i.e., prior mediastinal instrumentation, mediastinitis); Prior abdominal surgery in the epigastric region; Planned sternotomy; Prior chest radiotherapy; Or any other prior/planned medical intervention not listed that precludes their participation in the opinion of the Investigator.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Previous pericarditis
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patient has previous pericarditis that: Was chronic and recurrent, or Resulted in pericardial effusion, or Resulted in pericardial thickening or calcification.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Medical conditions or anatomies
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patients with these medical conditions or anatomies are excluded from participation in the study: Hiatal hernia that distorts mediastinal anatomy; Marked sternal abnormality (e.g., pectus excavatum); Decompensated heart failure; COPD with oxygen dependence; Gross hepatosplenomegaly; Or any other known medical condition or anatomy type not listed that precludes their participation in the opinion of the Investigator.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Defibrillation testing contraindication
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patients with a medical condition that precludes them from undergoing defibrillation testing: Severe aortic stenosis; Current Intracardiac LA or LV thrombus; Severe proximal three-vessel or left main coronary artery disease without revascularization; Hemodynamic instability; Unstable angina; Recent stroke or transient ischemic attack (within the last 6 months); Known inadequate external defibrillation; LVEF < 20%; LVEDD >70 mm; Or any other known medical condition not listed that precludes their participation in the opinion of the Investigator.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Active infection
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patient with any evidence of active infection or undergoing treatment for an infection.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Anticoagulation contraindication
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patient is contraindicated from temporary suspension of oral/systemic anticoagulation

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Neurostimulator or implanted device
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patient with current implantation of neurostimulator or any other chronically implanted device that delivers current in the body.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Class III ICD criteria
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patient meets ACC/AHA/HRS or ESC clinical guideline Class III criteria for an ICD (e.g., life expectancy of less than 12 months).

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Concurrent clinical study
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patient is enrolled or planning to enroll in a concurrent clinical study that may confound the results of this study, without documented pre-approval from a Medtronic study manager.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Local law exclusion criteria
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Patient with any exclusion criteria as required by local law (e.g., age or other).

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Pregnant or breastfeeding women
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Pregnant women or breastfeeding women, or women of child bearing potential and who are not on a reliable form of birth regulation method or abstinence.
